actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to the term of office of President and Vice President of the United States.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Declares that the term of office of the President and Vice President shall be six years, and no person shall be elected to the office of President or Vice President more than once. Makes a person who has been elected Vice President for any term eligible for election as President for a later term.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to the term of office of President and Vice President of the United States.
